data.title: Ghyll Park Farm
data.meta_description: Ghyll Park Farm - A fantastic five-bedroom barn conversion resting on the outskirts of Horam, Sussex. Open-plan. Woodburning stove. Off-road parking. Dog-friendly. Bedrooms with TVs. Eastbourne 15.3 miles; Royal Tunbridge Wells 15.4 miles; Hastings 20.3 miles.
data.text:
"Wonderful house to stay in for family get together."

The owners were very helpful and very friendly. It was definitely one of the best properties we have ever stayed in. The Welcome package was so very generous. We enjoyed making use of the Pizza oven and the BBQ and the Games Room.

Reviewed by Jackie5.0★Aug 2024

"Amazing holiday!"

Shiri clearly puts so much effort into the property. The cleanliness, facilities, and thought were all outstanding. The welcome package, baked goods, and ice cream all went down a treat! The local walks were lovely, especially as they're on the doorstep of the property. Perfect for dogs too! Everything felt luxurious! Will definitely be booking again!

Thank you so much for such lovely feedback! We're absolutely thrilled you all enjoyed your stay and the accommodation. So glad you had a chance to also enjoy walking in our woodlands and fields, and we loved meeting you all and your gorgeous dogs!! We'd be delighted to welcome you back soon. Property Owner

Reviewed by Chloe5.0★Jul 2024

"We had a lovely stay here and couldn't fault the property."

Would definitely stay here again and recommend to friends and family.

Many thanks for your lovely feedback! We're absolutely delighted you enjoyed your stay and the property and we'll be thrilled to welcome you all back! Property Owner

Reviewed by Briony5.0★May 2024

"A beautiful place to stay."

Spotlessly clean. The welcome hamper was a lovely touch. Shiri even bought home made ice cream round for us. The grandchildren really enjoyed the tractor ride. Thank you Shiri. If we needed to ask anything I just text Shiri and she answered straight away. We will be visiting again. Highly recommended.

Thank you so much for your lovely feedback! It was an absolute pleasure meeting you all, including your beautiful dog, and we're thrilled you all enjoyed your stay and accommodation! We'd be delighted to welcome you all back again in the future. Property Owner

Reviewed by Carol5.0★May 2024

"Ghyll Park Farm is a beautiful place to stay!"

We were so impressed with how spacious and luxurious both the downstairs and upstairs was and the kitchen was fully equipped with everything we needed. The beautiful decor made it feel so inviting and homely, and it was so lovely to be greeted by a welcoming hamper of treats. Our host, Shiri, was so friendly and accommodating and we couldn't have asked for a better weekend! I would highly recommend!

Reviewed by Rachel5.0★Apr 2024

"Marvellously well appointed and a great place to stay."

Loads of places to visit within a short distance. I thoroughly recommend considering this as a definite location and property to top a shortlist. The owners are also friendly and commicative. Enjoy!

Reviewed by John5.0★Dec 2023

"We are a family of 8, ranging in age from 9 to 85 years and spent a wonderful week at Ghyll Park Farm celebrating my husband's 85th birthday and enjoying a pre-Christmas get-together."

The accommodation was just perfect with a beautiful Christmas tree and a truly magnificent welcome pack, including a delicious birthday cake too. We could not have chosen a better venue! Thank you so much, Shiri for all your attention to detail. We shall have many happy memories of our wonderful holiday at the farm.

Reviewed by Catherine5.0★Dec 2023

"Would definitely recommend."

A wonderful dog friendly cottage and the welcome pack was the best we have ever had including home made cakes. Everything we asked for was provided and the owners even tried to help with finding someone to look after the dogs for an evening. Such a relaxing stay as the garden was totally dog safe and the cottage decor just hit the right note of luxury but was still comfortable.

Thank you so much for your lovely feedback! We're absolutely thrilled you all enjoyed your stay and that you found it comfortable for dogs and humans alike!.. We're delighted you chose our cottage for your friendly get together and would love to welcome you back in the future! Property Owner

Reviewed by Kim5.0★Nov 2023

"Beautiful property with lots of room for a family get together."

Would definitely recommend it 5*

Reviewed by Helen5.0★Nov 2023

"Lovely and luxurious property."

We, (7 adults, family group) had a very comfortable, cosy stay. Plenty of room, kitchen perfectly appointed, had everything we could need. All sparkling clean and of high quality. The welcome hamper was very generous. The host/owner was very responsive, answering queries very quickly, and was very friendly when some of us bumped into her on a walk around the grounds. We will be back - thank you!

Thank you so much for taking the time to post this lovely review, we're thrilled you all enjoyed the accommodation and your stay! Also glad to know that you've made the most of the various attractions in our area. We'll be delighted to welcone you all back! ATB Shiri Property Owner

Reviewed by Sharon5.0★Oct 2023

"Wonderful property."

Perfect location. Spotlessly clean. Facilities excellent. Goodies left by the owner were both a surprise and a lovely touch. Lots of positives. One veey small negative comment to the owners. Property is for 10 people - only 8 mugs and wine glasses.

We're thrilled you enjoyed your stay and the accommodation! Thank you very much for all your feedback including re 8 mugs/wine glasses, which have been duly topped up! Xx Property Owner

Reviewed by Lorraine5.0★Oct 2023

"We had a wonderful stay at Ghyll Park Farm."

The view from the cottage onto the paddocks is amazing and the setting is absolutely delightful and serene, with wonderful walking paths in the private woods and farmland. The house itself was very pretty and done up to such a superb standard, everything you need, very clean and very spacious. We will definitely return to explore the area more!

Reviewed by Michael5.0★Sep 2023

"Super property which has excellent facilities and thoughtful touches."

The owners are amazingly accommodating and effective comms meant that any small queries were swiftly resolved. They could not have worked harder to ensure that our stay was seamless and very enjoyable. Thank you Shiri!

Reviewed by Penelope5.0★Jul 2023

"We had a fantastic stay at Ghyll Park Farm."

It was a perfect place to celebrate our mum’s 70th birthday and comfortably accommodated our family of 10 (6 adults, 4 kids (3 five and under)). The accommodation had all the facilities we needed and the cleanliness was great. The welcome pack was a lovely touch and an example of the thoughtfulness of the hosts. We would stay again in a heartbeat!

Reviewed by Clare5.0★Jun 2023

"We loved our stay at Ghyll Park Farm - it is definitely much better than the description and pictures suggest - so spacious and finished to a very high standard."

Communication with the host was excellent! We particularly loved looking out on the lambs in the field in front. Plenty of the attendees mentioned that they'd like to bring their own families along. Only two things that could have improved out stay: 1. A toast rack!, and 2. Instructions on how to change the central heating temperature set-point - it was set to 21 degrees and we were very warm and couldn't find anything in the welcome information about how to unlock the heating panels.

Thank you very much for your lovely feedback, we're delighted you enjoyed your stay, accommodation and the views to our paddocks with young lambs! Thank you also for your two suggestions, very helpful to us and easily done, we shall action these straight away! ATB Shiri Property Owner

Reviewed by Lorna5.0★Apr 2023

"Superbly well appointed house, very comfortable."

Very grateful for the generous welcome pack left for us. Would recommend this house to anyone. Lovely open plan layout downstairs makes for a very sociable environment. The games room is a bonus. Very warm, spotlessly clean. It had everything we wanted. Nothing was too much trouble for Shiri, the owner, should we have any questions/needs.

Reviewed by Caroline5.0★Mar 2023

"Fabulous, comfortable and well equipped holiday home."

Every detail has been thought about and the property is designed well to accommodate up to 10 people with comfort. Walks from the doorstep. Lovely setting and accessible to countryside and coast. Highly recommend.

Thank you so much for such a lovely and thoughtful feedback, we are absolutely delighted you enjoyed your stay! Property Owner

Reviewed by Elaine5.0★Jan 2023

"Fantastic property!"

In a great location with all amenities required. Would definitely book again

Thank you so much! Very kind of you and we look forward to welcoming you again. ATB Shiri Property Owner

Reviewed by Claire5.0★Jan 2023

"Great communication from time of booking."

The house was even better than in the photos. The owner was close by and helpful and able to help with anything we needed. Would definitely recommend and would also happily stay again. A great weekend stay. Debbie

Many thanks for your lovely feedback! We're delighted you all enjoyed your stay and the accommodation, and glad to hear we were able to be of assistance. We would be very happy to welcome you all again to Ghyll Park Farm. ATB Shiri Property Owner

Reviewed by Debbie5.0★Dec 2022

"A beautifully designed and equipped place for a holiday."

Everything in the property has been chosen with careful thought and excellent taste. The showers are great, the beds are comfortable and the kitchen has everything you need. We had a great pre-Christmas break with family and would definitely recommend a stay here. There are plenty of places to visit nearby to suit all ages and tastes.

Reviewed by Verena5.0★Dec 2022

"A beautiful property in such serene and peaceful surroundings."

Everything within the property had been thoroughly thought out and to the highest standard. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here and meeting Shiri . We are hoping to return soon to see the lambs.

Thank you very much! It was lovely meeting you all and your beautiful dogs, and we're delighted you enjoyed your stay and birthday celebrations. We would love see you again, possibly for Easter Lambing... Property Owner

Reviewed by Jeanette5.0★Dec 2022

"We thoroughly enjoyed our weekend break at Ghyll Park Farm."

The owner, Shiri was extremely helpful and the welcome pack she provided was excellent and much appreciated.

Reviewed by Gladys5.0★Nov 2022

"Really lovely property."

Very clean and well equipped. The furnishings were well layed out and chosen for the property The owner was very friendly and helpful. The property was situated in a lovely setting with some very nice walks nearby. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

Reviewed by Amy5.0★Nov 2022

"Wonderful holiday cottage."

Lovely furnishings and so well equipped. Shiri, the hostess, was very helpful and accommodating, the welcome goodies were above and beyond and very thoughtful. Would definitely stay again!

Reviewed by J4.7★Nov 2022

"10 of us just had a lovely stay at Ghyll Park Farm, beautiful lodge on lovely land!"

The owner Shiri was so helpful and friendly & there was also a lovely welcome pack of food/drink left for us when we arrived. Would definitely recommend and will return Thanks again Shiri xx

Reviewed by Katie5.0★Oct 2022

"Excellent property, amazing views, done up to high standards and very spacious."

Being able to walk in the private land and woodlands is a great benefit and generally feels very private without being isolated from nearby amenities. Lots of sightseeing and activities withing 10-20 minutes' drive and plenty of parking next to the house.

Reviewed by Michael5.0★Sep 2022

"Stunning and spacious lodge which is extremely well equipped with everything you need (and more)."

A quiet and relaxing location within easy reach of local amenities. The games room was a great hit with the family (especially the grandchildren) and we all enjoyed the easily accessible walks. Shiri provided some useful information about the area and a much appreciated welcome pack. We all had a lovely time and couldn’t have asked for more.

Thank you so much for the lovely feedback! We're delighted you enjoyed your stay and the property, glad also to know that the information about local attractions and events was useful! We enjoyed meeting your family, including molly the spaniel, who was absolutely lovely! Property Owner

Reviewed by Pat5.0★Aug 2022

"We had the best time at Ghyll Farm."

The place is beautiful, very new, spacious, great games room where we played a lot of darts! We went for a walk in the woods and found a lovely pub for a drink. And Shiri went above and beyond supplying me with a baking tin and baking paper to help bake my sons birthday cake! Also the Strawberry tart that was awaiting us in the fridge, along with the other treats were fabulous!

Thank you, that's very kind, we're delighted you enjoyed your stay! It was lovely meeting you and your family and we're grateful you chose our property for your family get together and your son's birthday celebration. Property Owner

Reviewed by Linda5.0★Aug 2022

"We had a wonderful weekend stay at Ghyll Park Farm, Shiri, our lovely host was there to greet us on arrival and show us around and left us a beautiful hamper of goodies including a bottle of champagne which we enjoyed in the stunning garden."

Shiri was on hand for anything we needed. The house has been built and decorated to a very high standard, they have every device, utensil and price of equipment you could possibly need. The house is set in beautiful surrounding and we enjoyed a walk in their woodland. The games room was a huge hit with the children. All in all, A little piece of heaven in the sussex countryside.

Thank you so much for the great feedback. As our first guests it was a delight to have such a lovely family staying and enjoying the property and grounds. Property Owner

Reviewed by Robert5.0★Jul 2022
